name: BATTLEZ Cards & Dice
description:
A fast and fun collectible card game that combines with dice rolling action!

Players compete in BATTLEZ® to score the most points first combining strategy, skills, and luck to win! Practice to perfect your skills or battle for top rank worldwide free!

Go Pro and knockout your opponents faster!

BATTLEZ® Cards & Dice™ Game Time! vol. 1 card collection features The Amazing Presto™ the greatest kid magician ever dealing the cards! It's up to you to decide how to play your cards dealt both offense and defensive battle strategy, and learn how to preform real 3D dice throwing magic tricks!

Object of the Game:

The object of the game is to be the first to score enough BATTLEZ® Points 100+ to knockout (K.O.) your challenger/challengers, forcing your opponent to reduce your score back under 100 BATTLEZ® Points or loose the battle, or win by T.K.O. (technical knockout) scoring the most BATTLEZ® Points before the clock (1 or 5 minutes per battle) runs out!


How to Play:

The turn order of players in battle mode is determined by the games initial dice battle, giving the winner an advantage to play any offense cards first.

The goal of each game is to score the maximum BATTLEZ® Points possible within the time limit (1 or 5 minutes) or before your last turn is complete by utilizing as many dice as possible (any combination of 3: D6’s with dots, D10 ‘s or D20’s with numbers) plus using any card options to score, place traps or reduce your opponents score/chances of scoring per turn/roll of the dice.

The more BATTLEZ® Points 100+ scored upon a knockout (K.O.) before your turn is over the better. This makes it more difficult for your opponent to subtract enough points under 100 from your score to stay in the game! Once a player scores 100 BATTLEZ® Points or more (within any 1-5 minute game) a knockout is declared, your opponent then has one last chance to roll the dice/play any cards held to subtract enough points to reduce your score back under 100 points in order to stay in the game!


Sign-up:

Make sure to sign-up and save your game progress also receive 1,000 BATTLEZ® Points bonus! BATTLEZ® players start out in basic mode and can upgrade to BATTLEZ® Pro to unlock D20 dice!
